SRI.T.MADHU SMT .C.R.SARADAMANT RESPONDENTS: 1 STATE OF KERALA THROUGH THE STATION HOUSE OFFICER, HOUDURG POLICE STATION, KASARAGOD DISTRICT, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682031. 2 MARZOOK, AGED 23 YEARS, S/O.MUHAMMED KUNHI, RESIDING AT MARZOOK MANZIL, AVIYIL, KANHANGAD VILLAGE, HOUDURG TALUK, KASARAGOD DISTRICT 671315. 3 AJMAIL SHAHEER P.P. AGED 28 YEARS, S/O.HAMZA, RESIDING AT SADIYA MANZIL, AVIYIL, KANHANGAD VILLAGE, HOSDURG TALUK, KASARAGOD DISTRICT- 671315. BY ADV. KHALID N.A. SENIOR PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI C S HRITHWIK THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 10.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Crl.MC.No. 230 of 2019 3 201SIKERITS37 ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioners are the accused in C.C.No. 59 of 2016 on the file of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class-I, Hosdurg. They are alleged to have committed the offences under Sections 143, 147, 148, 323 and 324 IPC. The first accused is no more. Respondents 2 and 3 are the victims. Tt is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the trial court may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners and respondents 2 and 3 and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. 1 have perused the affidavits filed by respondents 2 and 3, who have entered appearance through counsel. I am satisfied that the matter has been settled and no public interest is involved in this case. There is no impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioners. Crl.MC.No. 230 of 2019 4 2019/KERIIS37 In the result, this Crl.M.C is allowed. The proceedings in C.C.No. 59 of 2016 on the file of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class-I, Hosdurg are quashed. If any material objects have been produced in this case, the trial court may pass appropriate orders for their disposal. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE MC/14.1.19 Deeaceeend Be Cr1.MC.No. 230 of 2019 5 2019/KER/1337 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al THE TRUE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.944/2015 OF HOSDURG POLICE STATION.
